elements.title: Paleoallium
elements.contents: ... that while named for alliums, the fossil Paleoallium (pictured) was not necessarily directly related to any allium species?

elements.title: Florian Ludwig
elements.contents: ... that as music director of the Oper Hagen, Florian Ludwig promoted a wide repertoire that included contemporary operas such as Barber's Vanessa and crossover projects?

elements.title: Lemmon Petrified Wood Park & Museum
elements.contents: ... that the Lemmon Petrified Wood Park & Museum contains 3,200 tons of petrified wood?

elements.title: E. Graham Howe
elements.contents: ... that E. Graham Howe "introduced Eastern philosophy to psychotherapy in England"?

elements.title: Ultimate Team
elements.contents: ... that the video game mode Ultimate Team has been criticized for its reliance on loot box packs, considered to be a controversial form of gambling?

elements.title: Kevin Davis
elements.contents: ... that police officer Kevin Davis's father, grandfather, and great-grandfather all served in public safety?

elements.title: removal of compulsory figures
elements.contents: ... that The Wall Street Journal considered the removal of compulsory figures from Olympic figure skating to be an "obvious" decision, and subsequent attempts to revive them as "surprising"?

elements.title: Matt Stoller
elements.contents: ... that Matt Stoller believes that "nearly any other cause or political relationship should be sacrificed" to break up monopolies?

elements.title: Morning Dew
elements.contents: ... that the Korean protest song "Morning Dew" was banned in North and South Korea?
